Class Panneau

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

            • modeles.Panneau
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Panneau
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Estimate maker java application with GUI. This class create radio buttons for the materials.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mohammad Saman, Vivor Kevin
    See Also:

                             int i,
                             int prix,
                             java.lang.String color)
        Methode for insert a new radio button in the new tab's panel
        Parameters:
        title - : title of the new radio button
        imgChemin - : path of the icon
        img - : path of the largest picture
        i - : total number of radio button for this tab
        prix - : the price of the material
        color - : the color of the material

        i - : the number of the radio button
